name: Vitamin D3 + K2

dosage.notes: Test 25(OH)D levels. Target 40-60 ng/mL. K2 (MK-7 form) directs calcium to bones.

keyFindings: Deficiency linked to higher all-cause mortality
Immune function, cancer risk reduction at optimal levels
